Class_Skill_Desc_Ascend: Resurrects target to a weakened state.
Class_Skill_Desc_Aspected Benefic: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Aspected Helios: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 150</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Astrodyne: Grants an effect using the astrosigns read from your divining deck.</br>Can only be executed after reading three astrosigns.</br>Effects granted are determined by the number of different types of astrosigns read.</br>1 Sign Type: Grants Harmony of Spirit</br>2 Sign Types: Grants Harmony of Spirit and Harmony of Body</br>3 Sign Types: Grants Harmony of Spirit, Harmony of Body, and Harmony of Mind</br>Duration: 15s</br>Harmony of Spirit Effect: Gradually restores own MP</br>Potency: 50</br>Harmony of Body Effect: Reduces spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 10%</br>Harmony of Mind Effect: Increases damage dealt and healing potency by 5%
Class_Skill_Desc_Benefic: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 500</br>Additional Effect: 15% chance next Benefic II will restore critical HP</br>Duration: 15s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Breath of the Earth: Restores 60% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Celestial Intersection: Restores own or target party member's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Additional Sect Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling 200% of the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s</br>Maximum Charges: 2//
Class_Skill_Desc_Celestial Opposition: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 200</br>Additional Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Collective Unconscious: Creates a celestial ring 8 yalms around the caster.</br>Duration: 18s</br>Additional Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10% for self and any party members within 30 yalms and applies Wheel of Fortune to self and any party members within 8 yalms</br>Duration: 5s</br>Wheel of Fortune Effect: Regen</br>Cure Potency: 100</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effects will be applied continuously to self and all party members standing within the celestial ring.</br>Collective Unconscious effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Divination: Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members by 6%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Draw: Draws a card (arcanum) from your divining deck. Only one arcanum can be drawn at a time.</br>Arcanum effect can be triggered using the action Play.</br>Additional Effect: Restores 5% of maximum MP</br>Additional Effect: Grants Clarifying Draw, allowing the execution of Redraw</br>//Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Skill_Desc_Earthly Star: Deploys an Earthly Star in the designated area and grants the effect of Earthly Dominance.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Executing Stellar Detonation while under the effect of Earthly Dominance creates a Stellar Burst dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 205 to all nearby enemies. Also restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 540</br>After 10s, Earthly Dominance effect is changed to Giant Dominance.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Waiting 10s or executing Stellar Detonation while under the effect of Giant Dominance creates a Stellar Explosion dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 310 to all nearby enemies. Also restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 720
Class_Skill_Desc_Essential Dignity: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>Potency increases up to 900 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 30% HP or less.</br>Maximum Charges: 2//
Class_Skill_Desc_Esuna: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.
Class_Skill_Desc_Exaltation: Reduces damage taken by self or target party member by 10%.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: Restores HP at the end of the effect's duration</br>Cure Potency: 500
Class_Skill_Desc_Fall Malefic: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 250.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gravity: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Class_Skill_Desc_Gravity II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 130 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Class_Skill_Desc_Healing Wind: Restores 25% of own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Class_Skill_Desc_Helios: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 400
Class_Skill_Desc_Horoscope: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Potency is determined by the Horoscope effect of party members. Effect expires upon execution.</br>Horoscope Potency: 200</br>Horoscope Helios Potency: 400
Class_Skill_Desc_Lady of Crowns: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Lightspeed: Reduces cast times for spells by 2.5 seconds.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Lord of Crowns: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 250 to all nearby enemies.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Macrocosmos: Deals unaspected damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 250 for the first enemy, and 40% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Macrocosmos to self and all nearby party members</br>Duration: 15s</br>Action changes to Microcosmos upon execution.</br>For the effect's duration, 50% of damage taken is compiled.</br>Restores HP equal to a cure of 200 potency plus compiled damage when the effect expires or upon execution of Microcosmos.</br>Amount restored cannot exceed the target's maximum HP.</br>Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Class_Skill_Desc_Malefic: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150.
Class_Skill_Desc_Malefic II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 160.
Class_Skill_Desc_Malefic III: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 190.
Class_Skill_Desc_Malefic IV: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 230.
Class_Skill_Desc_Microcosmos: Triggers the healing effect of Macrocosmos, restoring HP equal to a cure of 200 potency plus 50% of compiled damage.</br>Amount restored cannot exceed the target's maximum HP.
Class_Skill_Desc_Minor Arcana: Draws either the Lord of Crowns or the Lady of Crowns from your divining deck.</br>Action changes to the drawn arcanum.</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Neutral Sect: Increases healing magic potency by 20%.</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: When casting Aspected Benefic or Aspected Helios, erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage</br>Aspected Benefic Effect: Nullifies damage equaling 250% of the amount of HP restored</br>Aspected Helios Effect: Nullifies damage equaling 125% of the amount of HP restored</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Aspected Benefic: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 5,000</br>Potency increases up to 10,000 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 50% HP or less.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Nocturnal Benefic to target</br>Nocturnal Benefic Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 5,000 potency</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Celestial River: Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 30%. Effect is reduced by 10% every 5 seconds.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members by 30%. Effect is reduced by 10% every 5s.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 105s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Double Cast: Repeats the spell you previously cast.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Can only be executed following a spell.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Draw: Draws the Balance, the Bole, or the Arrow from your divining deck.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Fall Malefic: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 5,000.</br>Additonal Effect: Reduces the recast time of Double Cast by 10 seconds</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Gravity II: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts first target with Bind</br>Duration: 3s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Macrocosmos: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Macrocosmos to self and all nearby party members</br>Duration: 10s</br>Action changes to Microcosmos upon execution.</br>For the effect's duration, 25% of damage taken is compiled.</br>Restores HP equal to a cure of 4,000 potency plus compiled damage when the effect expires or upon execution of Microcosmos.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Microcosmos: Triggers the healing effect of Macrocosmos, restoring HP equal to a cure of 4,000 potency plus 25% of compiled damage.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_the Arrow: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, as well as spell cast time and recast time for self or target and nearby party members by 10%, while also increasing movement speed by 25%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_the Balance: Increases damage dealt by self or target and all nearby party members by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_the Bole: Reduces damage taken by self or target and nearby party members by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Play: Triggers the effect of your drawn arcanum.
Class_Skill_Desc_Redraw: Draws a different arcanum from your deck.</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Clarifying Draw.
Class_Skill_Desc_Repose: Afflicts target with Sleep.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rescue: Instantly draws target party member to your side. Cannot be used outside of combat or when target is suffering from certain enfeeblements.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stellar Detonation: While under the effect of Earthly Dominance, detonates the currently deployed Earthly Star, creating a Stellar Burst that deals unaspected damage with a potency of 205 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members</br>Cure Potency: 540</br>While under the effect of Giant Dominance, detonates the currently deployed Earthly Star, creating a Stellar Explosion that deals unaspected damage with a potency of 310 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members</br>Cure Potency: 720
Class_Skill_Desc_Surecast: Spells can be cast without interruption.</br>Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Synastry: Generate an aetheric bond with target party member. Each time you cast a single-target healing spell on yourself or a party member, the party member with whom you have the bond will also recover HP equaling 40% of the original spell.</br>Duration: 20s
Class_Skill_Desc_Undraw: Returns the currently drawn arcanum back to your deck.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Arrow: Increases damage dealt by a party member or self by 6% if target is melee DPS or tank, or 3% for all other roles.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants a Lunar Sign when used in combat</br>//Only one arcanum effect can be applied to a target at a time.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Balance: Increases damage dealt by a party member or self by 6% if target is melee DPS or tank, or 3% for all other roles.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants a Solar Sign when used in combat</br>//Only one arcanum effect can be applied to a target at a time.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Bole: Increases damage dealt by a party member or self by 6% if target is ranged DPS or healer, or 3% for all other roles.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants a Solar Sign when used in combat</br>//Only one arcanum effect can be applied to a target at a time.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Ewer: Increases damage dealt by a party member or self by 6% if target is ranged DPS or healer, or 3% for all other roles.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants a Lunar Sign when used in combat</br>//Only one arcanum effect can be applied to a target at a time.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Spear: Increases damage dealt by a party member or self by 6% if target is melee DPS or tank, or 3% for all other roles.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants a Celestial Sign when used in combat</br>//Only one arcanum effect can be applied to a target at a time.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Spire: Increases damage dealt by a party member or self by 6% if target is ranged DPS or healer, or 3% for all other roles.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Additional Effect: Grants a Celestial Sign when used in combat</br>//Only one arcanum effect can be applied to a target at a time.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Status_Desc_Combust III: Damage dealt and potency of all HP restoration actions are reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Divination: Damage dealt is increased while damage taken is reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Horoscope: Primed to receive the healing effects of Horoscope.
Class_Status_Desc_Intersection: A magicked barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Macrocosmos: Restores HP when effect duration expires or the astrologian who granted this effect executes Microcosmos. Healing potency is based on damage taken and compiled over the duration of the effect.
Class_Status_Desc_Neutral Sect: Spell cast and recast times are reduced.</br>Helios is upgraded to Aspected Helios, while Benefic is upgraded to Aspected Benefic.
Class_Status_Desc_Surecast: Spells cannot be interrupted by taking damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Swiftcast: Next spell will require no time to cast.
Class_Status_Desc_Synastry: An aetheric bond is created with a party astrologian. Each time a single-target healing spell is cast by the astrologian, you will recover partial HP.
Class_Trait_Desc_Combust Mastery II: Upgrades Combust II to Combust III.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Benefic: Grants a 15% chance that your next Benefic II will restore critical HP.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Celestial Inte: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Celestial Intersection.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Draw: Grants Clarifying Draw after executing Draw.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Draw II: Grants a Solar Sign, Lunar Sign, or Celestial Sign according to your arcanum played in combat.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Essential Dign: Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Essential Dignity.</br>Maximum Charges: 2
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Healing Magic: Increases the healing potency of Benefic to 500, Helios to 400, Benefic II to 800, Aspected Benefic to 250, Aspected Benefic's Regen effect to 250, Aspected Helios to 250, and Aspected Helios's Regen effect to 150.
Class_Trait_Desc_Hyper Lightspeed: Reduces Lightspeed recast time to 90 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Maim and Mend II: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.
Class_Trait_Desc_Malefic Mastery II: Upgrades Malefic II to Malefic III.
Class_Trait_Desc_Malefic Mastery III: Upgrades Malefic III to Malefic IV.
Class_Trait_Desc_Malefic Mastery IV: Upgrades Malefic IV to Fall Malefic.
